metadata.title: CVE-2017-3158 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition in Guacamole's terminal emulator in versions 0.9.5 through0.9.10-incubating could allow writes of blocks of printed data to overlap.Such overlapping writes could cause packet data to be misread as the packetlength, resulting in the remaining data being written beyond the end of astatically-allocated buffer.

criterions.comment: guacamole-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
guacamole-client: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
